urn:Campaign.urn:Name: 201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants_V22
urn:Campaign.urn:Description: Student Enrolment Chase, New Entrants for 201819
urn:Campaign.urn:StatedGoal: Increase in student enrolment and decreased administration overheads

urn:ContextParameter.urn:Name: v_Chase1_sent
urn:ContextParameter.urn:Description: has Chase1 email already been sent.

urn:ContextParameter.urn:Name: v_Chase2_sent
urn:ContextParameter.urn:Description: has Chase2 email already been sent.

urn:ContextParameter.urn:Name: v_Days_Past_Start
urn:ContextParameter.urn:Description: Number of days past Students Programme Start date.

urn:ContextParameter.urn:Name: v_Fluffy1_Sent
urn:ContextParameter.urn:Description: has Fluffy1 email already been sent.

urn:ContextParameter.urn:Name: v_Fluffy2_sent
urn:ContextParameter.urn:Description: has Fluffy2 email already been sent.

urn:ContextParameter.urn:Name: v_LateStarter_sent
urn:ContextParameter.urn:Description: has Late Starter email already been sent.

urn:ContextParameter.urn:Name: v_ProgramCategory
urn:ContextParameter.urn:Description: Category of Students Programme (P, N or O)

urn:StopNode.urn:Name: Stop_ordinary
urn:StopNode.urn:Description: No Showers or beyond Freeze date.

urn:Transition.urn:GuardConditionRule: v_which_email = "NoShow" and v_Chase3_sent = "Y" and (v_ESTS_Code="EE" or v_ESTS_Code="EL" or v_ESTS_Code="PE" or v_ESTS_Code="RE" or v_ESTS_Code="YE" or v_ESTS_Code = "PL" or v_ESTS_Code = "YL") and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_Deceased = "N" and v_on_hold = "N" and v_NoShow_sent = "N"

v_which_email = "Freeze" and (v_ESTS_Code="EE" or v_ESTS_Code="EL" or v_ESTS_Code="PE" or v_ESTS_Code="RE" or v_ESTS_Code="YE" or v_ESTS_Code = "PL" or v_ESTS_Code = "YL") and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_Deceased = "N" and v_on_hold = "N"

v_which_email = "Chase2" and (v_ESTS_Code="EE" or v_ESTS_Code="EL" or v_ESTS_Code="PE" or v_ESTS_Code="RE" or v_ESTS_Code="YE" or v_ESTS_Code = "PL" or v_ESTS_Code = "YL") and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_Deceased = "N" and v_on_hold = "N" and v_Chase2_sent = "N" and ( v_Chase1_sent = "Y" or v_LateStarter_sent ="Y" )

urn:GuardLabel.urn:Description: Between 20 and 10 days before start date.

urn:Transition.urn:GuardConditionRule: v_which_email = "Fluffy1" and (v_ESTS_Code="EE" or v_ESTS_Code="EL" or v_ESTS_Code="PE" or v_ESTS_Code="RE" or v_ESTS_Code="YE" or v_ESTS_Code = "PL" or v_ESTS_Code = "YL") and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_Deceased = "N" and v_on_hold = "N" and v_Fluffy1_Sent = "N"

(v_ESTS_Code = "AA" or v_ESTS_Code = "EN" or v_ESTS_Code = "EX" or v_ESTS_Code = "NR" or v_ESTS_Code = "PA" or v_ESTS_Code = "PN" or v_ESTS_Code = "RA" or v_ESTS_Code = "RN" or v_ESTS_Code = "SB" or v_ESTS_Code = "WU" or v_ESTS_Code = "YA") and v_Deceased = "N" and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_on_hold = "N"

v_Deceased = "N" and ( (v_ESTS_Code = "WD" or v_ESTS_Code = "NS" or v_ESTS_Code = "SS" or v_ESTS_Code = "SU" or v_ESTS_Code = "LH" or v_ESTS_Code = "EC" or v_ESTS_Code = "EP" or v_ESTS_Code = "PP" or v_ESTS_Code = "RW" or v_ESTS_Code = "WR" or v_ESTS_Code = "WX" or v_ESTS_Code = "YP") or v_STST_Code <> "AS" or v_on_hold = "Y")

urn:GuardLabel.urn:Description: Between emails, Not Enrolled, Eligible and not Withdrawn.

urn:Transition.urn:GuardConditionRule: (v_which_email = "None" or (v_which_email = "Fluffy1" and v_Fluffy1_Sent = "Y") or (v_which_email = "Fluffy2" and v_Fluffy2_sent = "Y") or (v_which_email = "Chase1" and v_Chase1_sent = "Y" and v_Fluffy1_Sent = "Y" and v_Fluffy2_sent = "Y") or (v_which_email = "Chase2" and v_Chase2_sent = "Y" and v_Chase1_sent = "Y" and v_Fluffy1_Sent = "Y" and v_Fluffy2_sent = "Y") or (v_which_email = "Chase3" and v_Chase2_sent = "N" and v_LateStarter_sent = "N") or (v_which_email = "NoShow" and v_Chase3_sent = "N") ) and (v_ESTS_Code="EE" or v_ESTS_Code="EL" or v_ESTS_Code="PE" or v_ESTS_Code="RE" or v_ESTS_Code="YE" or v_ESTS_Code = "PL" or v_ESTS_Code = "YL") and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_Deceased = "N" and v_on_hold = "N"

( ( v_which_email = "Chase1" and v_Fluffy2_sent = "N") or ( v_which_email = "Chase2" and v_Chase1_sent = "N" and v_LateStarter_sent = "N") ) and (v_ESTS_Code="EE" or v_ESTS_Code="EL" or v_ESTS_Code="PE" or v_ESTS_Code="RE" or v_ESTS_Code="YE" or v_ESTS_Code = "PL" or v_ESTS_Code = "YL") and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_Deceased = "N" and v_on_hold = "N"

urn:GuardLabel.urn:Description: Within 8 days after the start date.

urn:Transition.urn:GuardConditionRule: v_which_email = "Fluffy2" and (v_ESTS_Code="EE" or v_ESTS_Code="EL" or v_ESTS_Code="PE" or v_ESTS_Code="RE" or v_ESTS_Code="YE" or v_ESTS_Code = "PL" or v_ESTS_Code = "YL") and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_Deceased = "N" and v_on_hold = "N" and v_Fluffy2_sent = "N"

v_which_email = "Chase3" and (v_ESTS_Code="EE" or v_ESTS_Code="EL" or v_ESTS_Code="PE" or v_ESTS_Code="RE" or v_ESTS_Code="YE" or v_ESTS_Code = "PL" or v_ESTS_Code = "YL") and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_Deceased = "N" and v_on_hold = "N" and v_Chase3_sent = "N" and ( v_Chase2_sent = "Y" or v_LateStarter_sent ="Y" )

v_which_email = "Chase1" and (v_ESTS_Code="EE" or v_ESTS_Code="EL" or v_ESTS_Code="PE" or v_ESTS_Code="RE" or v_ESTS_Code="YE" or v_ESTS_Code = "PL" or v_ESTS_Code = "YL") and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_Deceased = "N" and v_on_hold = "N" and v_Chase1_sent = "N" and v_Fluffy2_sent = "Y"

urn:Population.urn:Name: 201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants_POP
urn:Population.urn:Description: Population for New Entrants chase email

urn:ExpressionDefinition.urn:XmlExpression: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?><Expression xmlns="urn:com.sungardhe.common.services.selection.querygenerator"><DatabaseColumnName>SPRIDEN_PIDM</DatabaseColumnName><DatabaseLocationName>Student</DatabaseLocationName><DataType>number</DataType><Subquery><Statement>select spriden_pidm from spriden, sgbstdn, sfbetrm where SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_PIDM = SFBETRM.SFBETRM_PIDM and SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF = SFBETRM.SFBETRM_TERM_CODE and SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_PIDM = SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_PIDM and SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_ADMIT = SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF and SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL and SFBETRM.SFBETRM_ESTS_CODE in ('EL','EE','PE','RE','YE','PL','YL') and SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_STST_CODE = 'AS' and SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_CAMP_CODE not in ('MY', 'DL', 'EL', 'VT', 'SI','XX') and SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_PROGRAM_1 != '4326' and SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_PROGRAM_1 not in (select gtvsdax_external_code from gtvsdax where gtvsdax_internal_code_group = 'PRSESS_CRS_CODE' and gtvsdax_internal_code = 'PRSESS_CRS') and SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF = :1 and exists (select 'true' from goremal where GOREMAL_PIDM = SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_PIDM and GOREMAL_STATUS_IND = 'A' and GOREMAL_PREFERRED_IND = 'Y') and exists (select 'true' from spbpers where SPBPERS.SPBPERS_PIDM = SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_PIDM and nvl(SPBPERS.SPBPERS_DEAD_IND, 'N') != 'Y' ) and exists (select 'true' from sarappd, saradap where sarappd_pidm = SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_PIDM and SARAPPD_TERM_CODE_ENTRY = SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF and ( (nvl(SARADAP_PROGRAM_1,'null') = nvl(SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_PROGRAM_1,'null') and nvl(SARADAP_MAJR_CODE_1,'null')=nvl(SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_MAJR_CODE_1,'null')) or (nvl(SARADAP_PROGRAM_2,'null') = nvl(SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_PROGRAM_2,'null') and nvl(SARADAP_MAJR_CODE_2,'null')=nvl(SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_MAJR_CODE_2,'null')) ) and SARADAP_PIDM = SARAPPD_PIDM and SARADAP_TERM_CODE_ENTRY = SARAPPD_TERM_CODE_ENTRY and SARADAP_APPL_NO = SARAPPD_APPL_NO and SARAPPD_APDC_CODE in ('UA','UF') and trunc(SARAPPD_APDC_DATE) <= trunc(sysdate-7) ) and SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_PROGRAM_1 not in (select gtvsdax_external_code from gtvsdax where gtvsdax_internal_code_group = 'BRM' and gtvsdax_internal_code = 'NON_STANDD') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'true' FROM SPRHOLD WHERE SPRHOLD_PIDM = SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_PIDM AND SPRHOLD_HLDD_CODE = 'FQ' AND ( SYSDATE >= SPRHOLD_FROM_DATE AND SYSDATE <= SPRHOLD_TO_DATE))</Statement><Bindings><Timestamp>0</Timestamp><Size>1</Size><Binding><Id>1</Id><BindingName>Reg_Term</BindingName><Description>Registration Term</Description><DataType>string</DataType><DataSource>literal</DataSource><Value>201920</Value><Property><Name>groupId</Name><Value>9CE4D9A4-275C-B048-0109-75A25EB634CD</Value></Property><Property><Name>groupType</Name><Value>is</Value></Property></Binding></Bindings></Subquery></Expression>

urn:CommunicationTemplate.urn:Name: Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants_201920_Late_Starter_email
urn:CommunicationTemplate.urn:Description: New Entrants Chase, Late Starter email

urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Subject: University of Southampton - Enrolment Chase
urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Content:
Time to Enrol

Hello |::=Constituent.Name Information.FirstName::|,

Your Student ID: |::=Constituent.Identifiers.Banner ID::|, 
Programme: |::=Curricula.Student Program of Study.Primary Major Description(Term="201920")::|, 
Expected start date: |::=UoS_Student.UoS Academic History.UoS_Start_Date(term="201920")::|

Welcome to the University of Southampton

Please visit our Welcome Page to - 
Set up your IT Account 
Pay your tuition fees 
Enrol
Apply for your student ID card
Advise the University of any Special requirements

Visit our Welcome Page

All students are required to enrol, wherever they are studying. 

Best wishes for the year ahead.

Please do not respond to this email but send any queries to enrol@soton.ac.uk.

 

 
 
Courses        University life        Research        Business       Global connections
 
CONNECT WITH US
       
 
University of Southampton
SO17 1BJ United Kingdom
All Rights Reserved 2017
enrol@southampton.ac.uk
Tel: +44 (0)23 8059 8888

urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Subject: University of Southampton - Enrolment Chase
urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Content:
Time to Enrol

Hello |::=Constituent.Name Information.FirstName::|,
 

Your Student ID: |::=Constituent.Identifiers.Banner ID::|, 
Programme: |::=Curricula.Student Program of Study.Primary Major Description(Term="201920")::|, 
Expected start date: |::=UoS_Student.UoS Academic History.UoS_Start_Date(term="201920")::|

Welcome to the University of Southampton

We are writing to remind you to visit the Welcome Page to complete all the processes required for you to become a student at the University of Southampton.

 

Visit our Welcome Page

 

If you are experiencing any problems with the enrolment process, please contact our Enrolment Hotline on +44(0)23 8059 8888 as soon as possible.

If you are attending the University you must now enrol. If you do not do so we may remove your access to university systems and you will not be able to apply for an ID card.

If you have decided not to attend the University of Southampton this year, please let us know by emailing admissions@soton.ac.uk and we will update your records so we no longer chase you to enrol.

Best wishes for the year ahead.

Please do not respond to this email but send any queries to enrol@soton.ac.uk.

 

 
 
Courses        University life        Research        Business       Global connections
 
CONNECT WITH US
       
 
University of Southampton
SO17 1BJ United Kingdom
All Rights Reserved 2017
enrol@southampton.ac.uk
Tel: +44 (0)23 8059 8888

urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Subject: University of Southampton - Enrolment Chase
urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Content:
Time to Enrol

Hello |::=Constituent.Name Information.FirstName::|,
 

Your Student ID: |::=Constituent.Identifiers.Banner ID::|, 
Programme: |::=Curricula.Student Program of Study.Primary Major Description(Term="201920")::|, 
Expected start date: |::=UoS_Student.UoS Academic History.UoS_Start_Date(term="201920")::|

Welcome to the University of Southampton

Our records show that your programme start date is approaching or has already passed, and you have not yet enrolled. We are writing to remind you to visit the Welcome Page to complete all the processes required for you to become a student at the University of Southampton.

 

Visit our Welcome Page

 

If you are experiencing any problems with the enrolment process, please contact our Enrolment Hotline on +44(0)23 8059 8888 as soon as possible.

If you are attending the University you must now enrol. If you do not do so we may remove your access to university systems and you will not be able to apply for an ID card.

If you have decided not to attend the University of Southampton this year, please let us know by emailing admissions@soton.ac.uk and we will update your records so we no longer chase you to enrol.

Best wishes for the year ahead.

Please do not respond to this email but send any queries to enrol@soton.ac.uk.

Welcome to the University of Southampton

Our records show that your programme start date is approaching or has already passed, and you have not yet enrolled. We are writing to remind you to visit the Welcome Page to complete all the processes required for you to become a student at the University of Southampton.

 

Visit our Welcome Page

 

If you are experiencing any problems with the enrolment process, please contact our Enrolment Hotline on +44(0)23 8059 8888 as soon as possible.

If you are attending the University you must now enrol. If you do not do so we may remove your access to university systems and you will not be able to apply for an ID card.

If you have decided not to attend the University of Southampton this year, please let us know by emailing admissions@soton.ac.uk and we will update your records so we no longer chase you to enrol.

Best wishes for the year ahead.

urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Subject: University of Southampton - Enrolment Chase
urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Content:
Time to Enrol

Hello |::=Constituent.Name Information.FirstName::|,

Your Student ID: |::=Constituent.Identifiers.Banner ID::|, 
Programme: |::=Curricula.Student Program of Study.Primary Major Description(Term="201920")::|, 
Expected start date: |::=UoS_Student.UoS Academic History.UoS_Start_Date(term="201920")::|

Despite several reminders our records show that you have still not completed the enrolment process for the current academic year.

If you are experiencing any problems with the enrolment process, or if your start has been delayed, please contact our Enrolment Hotline on +44(0)23 8059 8888 as soon as possible.

If you have decided not to attend the University of Southampton this year, please let us know by emailing admissions@soton.ac.uk and we will update your records so we no longer chase you to enrol. 

Visit our Welcome Page

 

If you have already started your studies, you are strongly urged to take immediate action, as the University will proceed to deem you as non-showing seven days from the date of this communication. To be ‘deemed a non-showing entrant’ means that you would be permanently removed from your programme at the University, unable to commence at a later date.

Are you a Tier 4 visa student studying in the UK?  It is your responsibility to enrol. The University will report any non-enrolment to UK Visas and Immigration who are likely to regard this as evidence that you are not complying with the terms of your visa, and you risk being excluded from the UK.   

Please do not respond to this email but send any queries to enrol@soton.ac.uk.

 

 
 
Courses        University life        Research        Business       Global connections
 
CONNECT WITH US
       
 
University of Southampton
SO17 1BJ United Kingdom
All Rights Reserved 2017
enrol@southampton.ac.uk
Tel: +44 (0)23 8059 8888

To be ‘deemed a non-showing entrant’ means that you would be permanently removed from your programme at the University, unable to commence at a later date.

Are you a Tier 4 visa student studying in the UK?  It is your responsibility to enrol. The University will report any non-enrolment to UK Visas and Immigration who are likely to regard this as evidence that you are not complying with the terms of your visa, and you risk being excluded from the UK.   

Please do not respond to this email but send any queries to enrol@soton.ac.uk.

urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Subject: University of Southampton - Enrolment Chase
urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Content:
Deemed Non Showing

Dear |::=Constituent.Name Information.FirstName::|,

Your Student ID number |::=Constituent.Identifiers.Banner ID::| 
Programme: |::=Curricula.Student Program of Study.Primary Major Description(Term="201920")::|

Despite a number of weekly reminders, our records indicate that you have not enrolled for the current Academic Session. 

Under the terms of the University’s Enrolment Policy all students are required to enrol for every year of academic study. If you are not enrolled, you are not entitled to receive tuition or use any of the University’s facilities. 

As a result of your continued failure to enrol, you have been Deemed Non Showing by the University and removed from active candidature.

  If you have a Tier 4 visa to study at the University of Southampton we have today removed sponsorship and informed UK Visas and Immigration who will cancel your visa.

We very much regret this decision, but you have been given every opportunity to enrol.

Your Faculty have also been informed, and we would expect you to take no further advantage of any University facilities (academic or non-academic).


We wish you every success for your future. 

Please do not respond to this email but send any queries to enrol@soton.ac.uk. 

 
 
Courses        University life        Research        Business       Global connections

University of Southampton

All Rights Reserved 2017

urn:RuleStatement.urn:Content: select nvl((select distinct 'Y' from brm_communications_campaign where banner_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm and brm_campaign_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants%' and brm_communication_record = 'EMAIL' and brm_template_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants% - Chase_email2'), 'N') as chase2_sent, nvl((select distinct 'Y' from brm_communications_campaign where banner_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm and brm_campaign_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants%' and brm_communication_record = 'EMAIL' and brm_template_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants% - Chase_email3'), 'N') as chase3_sent, nvl((select distinct 'Y' from brm_communications_campaign where banner_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm and brm_campaign_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants%' and brm_communication_record = 'EMAIL' and brm_template_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants% - Late_Starter'), 'N') as late_starter_sent, nvl((select distinct 'Y' from brm_communications_campaign where banner_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm and brm_campaign_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants%' and brm_communication_record = 'EMAIL' and brm_template_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants% - No_Show_email'), 'N') as no_show_sent from sgbstdn, sorlcur, skrhihi, skbhins where sgbstdn_pidm = ? and sgbstdn_term_code_eff = ? and sorlcur_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm and sorlcur_term_code = sgbstdn_term_code_eff and sorlcur_lmod_code = 'LEARNER' and sorlcur_current_cde = 'Y' and sorlcur_program = sgbstdn_program_1 and skrhihi_pidm(+) = sorlcur_pidm and skrhihi_term_code(+) = sorlcur_term_code and skrhihi_lcur_seqno(+) = sorlcur_seqno and skbhins_pidm(+) = skrhihi_pidm and skbhins_numhus(+) = skrhihi_numhus

urn:Rule.urn:Name: 201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants_which_sent_A
urn:Rule.urn:Description: Has new entrant been sent email A

urn:RuleStatement.urn:Content: select nvl((select distinct 'Y' from brm_communications_campaign where banner_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm and brm_campaign_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants%' and brm_communication_record = 'EMAIL' and brm_template_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants% - Fluffy_email_1'), 'N') as fluffy1_sent, nvl((select distinct 'Y' from brm_communications_campaign where banner_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm and brm_campaign_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants%' and brm_communication_record = 'EMAIL' and brm_template_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants% - Fluffy_email_2'), 'N') as fluffy2_sent, nvl((select distinct 'Y' from brm_communications_campaign where banner_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm and brm_campaign_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants%' and brm_communication_record = 'EMAIL' and brm_template_name like '201920_Enrolment_Chase_New_Entrants% - Chase_email1'), 'N') as chase1_sent from sgbstdn, sorlcur, skrhihi, skbhins where sgbstdn_pidm = ? and sgbstdn_term_code_eff = ? and sorlcur_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm and sorlcur_term_code = sgbstdn_term_code_eff and sorlcur_lmod_code = 'LEARNER' and sorlcur_current_cde = 'Y' and sorlcur_program = sgbstdn_program_1 and skrhihi_pidm(+) = sorlcur_pidm and skrhihi_term_code(+) = sorlcur_term_code and skrhihi_lcur_seqno(+) = sorlcur_seqno and skbhins_pidm(+) = skrhihi_pidm and skbhins_numhus(+) = skrhihi_numhus

urn:Rule.urn:Name: 201920_Enrolment_chase_New_Entrants_which_email
urn:Rule.urn:Description: Which email needs to be sent

urn:RuleStatement.urn:Content: select (case when trunc(SYSDATE) > to_date('29-Jun-2020') then 'Freeze' when (trunc(SYSDATE) - skbhins_comdate) between -20 and -11 then 'Fluffy1' when (trunc(SYSDATE) - skbhins_comdate) between 0 and 8 then 'Fluffy2' when (trunc(SYSDATE) - skbhins_comdate) = 11 then 'Chase1' when (trunc(SYSDATE) - skbhins_comdate) = 18 then 'Chase2' when (trunc(SYSDATE) - skbhins_comdate) = 25 then 'Chase3' when (trunc(SYSDATE) - skbhins_comdate) = 32 then 'NoShow' else 'None' end ) as target_email from sgbstdn, sorlcur, skrhihi, skbhins where sgbstdn_pidm = ? and sgbstdn_term_code_eff = ? and sorlcur_pidm = sgbstdn_pidm and sorlcur_term_code = sgbstdn_term_code_eff and sorlcur_lmod_code = 'LEARNER' and sorlcur_current_cde = 'Y' and sorlcur_program = sgbstdn_program_1 and skrhihi_pidm(+) = sorlcur_pidm and skrhihi_term_code(+) = sorlcur_term_code and skrhihi_lcur_seqno(+) = sorlcur_seqno and skbhins_pidm(+) = skrhihi_pidm and skbhins_numhus(+) = skrhihi_numhus
